TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementEntityAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ManagementEntityAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementEntityAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

span.span: The ManagementEntity attribute indicates that a class provides management information exposed through a WMI provider.

summary.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

span.span: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.

summary.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

span.span: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不接受名称参数。This constructor does not take a name parameter. 如果不通过使用指定名称参数，则关联的 WMI 类的名称将默认为特性化类的名称。If you do not specify a name by using the parameter, the name of the associated WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool External { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.External : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the class represents a WMI class in a provider implemented external to the current assembly.

value.span: 一个布尔值，如果此类表示一个外部 WMI 类和 false 否则也是如此。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents an external WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这用来实现提供程序实现扩展现有抽象 WMI 类的类。This is used when implementing providers that implement classes that extend existing abstract WMI classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the WMI class.

value.span: 包含 WMI 类的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the name of the WMI class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你不通过设置此属性指定 WMI 类的名称，WMI 类将默认为特性化类的名称。If you do not specify the name of the WMI class by setting this property, the WMI class will default to the name of the attributed class. ## Examples 在以下示例中，名称参数用于设置 MortgageCalcWMIProvider 类表示 WMI 类的名称。In the following example, the Name parameter is used to set the name of the WMI class represented by the MortgageCalcWMIProvider class. 它将名称设置为 MortgageCalculator。It sets the name to MortgageCalculator. 如果使用的参数不是该名称，相应的 C# 类名，MortgageCalcWMIProvider 在这种情况下，用作 WMI 类名。If the Name parameter is not used, the corresponding C# class name, MortgageCalcWMIProvider in this case, is used as the WMI class name. ``` [ManagementEntity(Name = "MortgageCalculator")] public class MortgageCalcWMIProvider { } ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Singleton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Singleton : bool with get, set

summary.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

span.span: Specifies whether the associated class represents a singleton WMI class.

value.span: 一个布尔值，如果该类表示单一实例 WMI 类和 false 否则也是如此。

span.span: A boolean value that is true if the class represents a singleton WMI class and false otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单一实例 WMI 类是一个为其可以只会有单个实例。A singleton WMI class is one for which there can only ever be a single instance. 尽管可以通过编写代码以确保曾经创建只能运行一个 WMI 类实例，但仍然提供此参数属性以使任务简单而一致。Although you could code the logic to ensure that only a single instance of a WMI class is ever created, this parameter attribute is provided to make the task easy and consistent. 当处理单一实例 WMI 类，客户端应用程序必须使用特殊语法。When working with singleton WMI classes, client applications must use special syntax. 有关详细信息，请参阅描述上的 MSDN online library 中的实例对象路径主题[ http://www.msdn.com ](http://www.msdn.com/)。For more information, see the Describing an Instance Object Path topic in the MSDN online library at [http://www.msdn.com](http://www.msdn.com/). ## Examples 下面的代码段演示如何使用单一实例参数指明的 C# 类对应于单一实例 WMI 类。The following code snippet demonstrates how to use the Singleton parameter to indicate that a C# class corresponds to a singleton WMI class. ``` [ManagementEntity(Singleton=true)] public class SingletonSample ``` 有关实现单一实例类的提供程序的完整的工作示例，请参阅[如何： 创建基本分离式提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300)。For a complete, working example of a provider that implements a singleton class, see [How to: Create a Basic Decoupled Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1dabd442-c1ff-40a1-bb0e-d7b3566c2300).
